name: Starship Duels
description:
This is a small prototype of a 2D Space Boss Battle Shooter for a University Game Design Course: DATT2300.

You play as a ship trying to fight an enemy ship to the death in single combat. Rather than being a fair fight, the prototype consists of a boss battle, with inspirations from bullet hell style games with a large health pool for the enemy and one life for the player. Try to duck and weave through the enemy  bullets, seize the opportunity of the cooldown between enemy's bullet burst fire, and destroy the enemy before they destroy you.

Controls:

Left Arrow - Moves Player Ship Left

Right Arrow - Moves Player Ship Right

P - Pauses the game

Created by: Estella Pham, 217277229

Additional Credits:

Love2D (Game Engine): https://love2d.org/

Jsfxr (Used to create the explosion sound): https://sfxr.me/

BeepBox (Used to create the music): https://www.beepbox.co
